attributes.title: HDH Throws A Challenge To Achieve World Peace || 21 September 2020 ||
attributes.description:
*PARAMASHIVAâ€™S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*THE PURE SPACE OF PEACE MANIFESTS ONLY FROM ONENESS. THE MOMENT DVANDVA COMES TO EXIST, THE FEAR OR GREED BECOMES THE COGNISED REALITY.

*NEVER ALLOW THE DVANDA, DVAITA AS COGNISED REALITY EVEN IF IT IS OBJECTIVE REALITY BECAUSE COGNISED REALITY IS THE DECISION MAKER, GAME CHANGER ABOUT YOUR OBJECTIVE REALITY.

*THERE ARE 3 REALITIES: OBJECTIVE, SUBJECTIVE, COGNISED.

*THE COGNISED REALITY CHANGES THE QUALITY, QUANTITY, DEFINITION, PERCEPTION, EXPERIENCE OF SUBJECTIVE REALITY THAT CHANGES THE OBJECTIVE REALITY PERCEIVED BY US.

*COGNISED REALITY IS THE ONLY ZONE WHERE YOU CAN WORK CONSCIOUSLY; ALTER THE COGNITION.

*UNFORTUNATELY, INSTEAD OF WORKING ON THE COGNISED REALITY, YOU GO ON WORKING ON THE OBJECTIVE REALITY.

*THE IDEAS WHICH MAKES YOU WORK ON OBJECTIVE REALITY SHOWING OBJECTIVE REALITY IS YOUR FIRST PRIORITY IS WHAT I CALL PIOUS FRAUD. IT MAKES YOU FEEL OBJECTIVE REALITY IS TOO IMPORTANT, TOO REAL AND NEEDS TO BE ATTENDED IMMEDIATELY.

*ANYTHING WHICH IS TOLD TO YOU IN A LOVING CARING WAY FOR YOUR INTEREST, ONLY THEN YOU START LISTENING.

*SO MAYA ENTERS INTO YOU IN A VERY PIOUS WAY CONVINCING YOU IT IS FOR YOUR GOOD SHE IS DOING WHAT SHE IS DOING.

THIS IS WHAT I CALL PIOUS FRAUD.

THE OBJECTIVE REALITY MAKES YOU BELIEVE THAT IT IS FOR YOUR GOOD YOU ARE ASKED TO MAKE CERTAIN DECISION, LIVE A CERTAIN WAY AND MAKE TO MOVE IN CERTAIN WAYS. O GOD! SONS OF DEVILS -
THE SO CALLED CHAOS INSTIGATORS OF SOCIETY.

*TODAY IS INTERNATIONAL PEACE DAY. WHOEVER INSPIRES THE REAL PEACE BRINGS LIBERATION AND ALL THE BEST THINGS OF THE WORLD TO YOU.
Read More At : https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/4385510201536796?__tn__=K-R
